item.title: Amber add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Amber add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Amber add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Amber add a quote by Kristina McMorris
item.description: "The whole world can become the enemy when you lose what you love." -- Kristina McMorris

item.title: Amber add a quote by Henri Nouwen
item.description: "When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives mean the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand. The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing, not curing, not healing and face with us the reality of our powerlessness, that is a friend who cares." -- Henri Nouwen

item.title: Amber add a quote by Jess C. Scott
item.description: "When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth." -- Jess C. Scott

item.title: Amber add a quote by Jon Katz
item.description: "I think if I've learned anything about friendship, it's to hang in, stay connected, fight for them, and let them fight for you. Don't walk away, don't be distracted, don't be too busy or tired, don't take them for granted. Friends are part of the glue that holds life and faith together. Powerful stuff." -- Jon Katz

item.title: Amber add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Amber add a quote by Gloria Naylor
item.description: "Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over." -- Gloria Naylor

item.title: Amber add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Amber add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Amber add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "People have forgotten this truth," the fox said. "But you mustn’t forget it. You become responsible forever for what you’ve tamed. You’re responsible for your rose." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Amber add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "She is a friend of my mind. She gather me, man. The pieces I am, she gather them and give them back to me in all the right order." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Amber add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description:
"You may not remember the time you let me go first. Or the time you dropped back to tell me it wasn't that far to go. Or the time you waited at the crossroads for me to catch up. You may not remember any of those, but I do and this is what I have to say to you:
Today, no matter what it takes, we ride home together." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Amber add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I don't care about whose DNA has recombined with whose. When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching--they are your family." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Amber add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Amber add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Maybe ever’body in the whole damn world is scared of each other." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Amber add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Amber add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Amber add a quote by Tahereh Mafi
item.description: "All I ever wanted was to reach out and touch another human being not just with my hands but with my heart." -- Tahereh Mafi

item.title: Amber add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "When you have nobody you can make a cup of tea for, when nobody needs you, that's when I think life is over." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Amber add a quote by W.S. Merwin
item.description:
"Separation
Your absence has gone through me Like thread through a needle. Everything I do is stitched with its color." -- W.S. Merwin

item.title: Amber add a quote by Deb Caletti
item.description: "The loneliness you feel with another person, the wrong person, is the loneliest of all." -- Deb Caletti

item.title: Amber add a quote by Jack Gilbert
item.description:
"Suddenly this defeat. This rain. The blues gone gray And the browns gone gray And yellow A terrible amber. In the cold streets Your warm body. In whatever room Your warm body. Among all the people Your absence The people who are always Not you.
I have been easy with trees Too long. Too familiar with mountains. Joy has been a habit. Now Suddenly This rain." -- Jack Gilbert

item.title: Amber add a quote by Miranda July
item.description: "In the weeks that followed, we amazed ourselves. Our habits slid apart easily...And our very few intimacies were simply discontinued. Where did they go, those things we did? Were they recycled? Did some new couple in China do them? Were a Swedish man and woman foot to foot at this very moment? " -- Miranda July

item.title: Amber add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "I am lonely, yet not everybody will do. I don’t know why, some people fill the gaps and others emphasize my loneliness." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Amber add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Don't worry about losing. If it is right, it happens - The main thing is not to hurry. Nothing good gets away." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Amber add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "I know I am but summer to your heart, and not the full four seasons of the year." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Amber add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Hearts Live By Being Wounded" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amber add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman
